description: Launch your AI product 100x faster with StartKit's boilerplate code. Includes user authentication, rate-limits, all OpenAI APIs, and more.
title: StartKit.AI â€§ Build AI Startups Faster
introduction: StartKit.AI is an AI boilerplate that provides everything needed to ship a SaaS product without requiring AI experience. It offers features like creating a ChatGPT clone, implementing OpenAI features, and additional functionalities for AI projects.
features: Create your own ChatGPT clone out of the box
Streaming API for fast response times
Web-browsing, history, DALL-E integration, and custom plugins
Advanced reasoning and broad knowledge with GPT-4-Turbo
Fallback models to avoid overloaded responses
Automatic image uploading for long-term storage
pricing: Buy once and own forever with regular updates and community support. Two plans available: Starter for simple AI projects and Growth for scalable products.

faqs.question: Is AI experience required to use StartKit.AI?
faqs.answer: No, StartKit.AI does not require AI experience.

faqs.question: What are the pricing plans for StartKit.AI?
faqs.answer: StartKit.AI offers two pricing plans: Starter for simple AI projects and Growth for scalable products.

faqs.question: What features are included in StartKit.AI?
faqs.answer: StartKit.AI includes features like creating a ChatGPT clone, streaming API, vision image input, advanced reasoning with GPT-4-Turbo, and more.
